comments:
20030716

The Synch View does not update after replacing with current - you to do a 
manual refresh to check and even that still shows folders.

STEPS
1) Load a project
2) Make and commit changes elsewhere
3) Refresh - changes show up
4) Select Replace With -> Latest From Repository
5) No update to view
6) Select refresh
7) View updated but the folders are still visible
This works for me. Is there anything in your log file?

Yes - I am not sure if this is the same thing but it is from the syncView
